headline: ComEd No. 1 in U.S. in Providing Reliable Electric Service to Customers, Benchmarking Shows
summary: CHICAGO, November 10, 2025--In a benchmark study of ComEd, compared to similar utilities, the utility was ranked number one in terms of how low the frequency and duration of outages were for customers. Recent metrics that reflect the frequency of outages for ComEd customers have improved by more than 50% compared to 2012 and earlier. Additionally, metrics that reflect the duration of outages have improved by approximately 20% over the same timeframe, meaning customers experience shorter interrup
